title: Tumi Tegra-Lite Suitcases on Sale at Nordstrom 2019
text:
4 items in this article Photo: Courtesy of the Retailer

Luggage can make or break your travel experience, which is why we’d like to direct your attention to this Tumi sale at Nordstrom. We hadn’t heard of Tegra-Lite until finding this deal, but these already durable rolling suitcases are made of Tegris, a thermoplastic composite that is used in race cars and protective gear for NFL players, which makes them extra light, as well. These carry-on and checked-size bags also have all the typical Tumi features — omnidirectional wheels, a TSA approved lock, and Tumi Tracer technology that tracks your bag — and right now, they’re 40 percent off.
